abstract: A dispute with HSBC Holdings was cited as the reason refund loans won’t be available.
snippet: A dispute with HSBC Holdings was cited as the reason refund loans won’t be available.
lead_paragraph: H&R Block, the tax-preparation firm, said Monday it might not be able to provide refund loans next year because of a dispute with HSBC Holdings.

headline.main: H&R Block May Not Provide Loans
headline.print_headline: H&R Block May Not Provide Loans
